wordGroup: preservative agent 防腐剂；保存剂
preservative treatment n. 防腐处理，防护处理

sentences.en: So far, specialists have worked to add preservative materials to the churches' exteriors.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，专家们一直在为教堂外围添加防腐性材料。

sentences.en: The preservative used is usually ethylene glycol or propylene glycol, as alcohol will evaporate quickly and the traps will dry out.
sentences.cn: 常用防腐剂是乙二醇或丙二醇，因为随着酒精快速挥发，捕集器也随之恢复干燥。

sentences.en: A pitfall trap can be any small container placed in the ground with the top level with the surrounding surface and filled with a preservative.
sentences.cn: 陷阱可以是任何放置在地面上的小容器，其顶部与周围的表面齐平，并装满防腐剂。
